name: Lost In (Space)
description:
Collect flowers in space. Realize how much this all sucks and how it's whittling away at my sanity. I feel like panicking.

Various audio+music:

"13 Ghosts II" by Nine Inch Nails

"Sleeping Under the Raintrees" by Midori Hirano

"Clarence Difference" by Baths

"11" by Kion001 on https://freesound.org/people/Kion001/sounds/440176/

"Soft Wind" by florianreichelt on https://freesound.org/people/florianreichelt/sounds/459977/

"Guardians Of Limbo: Magnus Choir VST, VST3, Audio Unit Preset" by syntheway on https://freesound.org/people/syntheway/sounds/278903/

"low pulsating hum" by Timbre on https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/169859/
